questions.question: MS Dhoni has played for only one franchise (Chennai Super Kings) in IPL history.
Virat Kohli has played for only one franchise (Royal Challengers Bangalore) in IPL history.
AB de Villiers has represented both Delhi Daredevils and Royal Challengers Bangalore in IPL.
Rohit Sharma started his IPL career with Deccan Chargers before moving to Mumbai Indians.
Chris Gayle holds the record for most sixes in IPL history.
Lasith Malinga has taken more wickets than any other bowler in IPL history.
Suresh Raina was the first player to score 5000 runs in IPL.
David Warner has won the Orange Cap (leading run-scorer) a record three times.
Ravindra Jadeja holds the record for most catches by a fielder in IPL history.
Shane Watson is the only player to have scored centuries in two different IPL finals.
